description: Custom manufacturer of packaging materials. Products include cushioning foam, corrugated or folding boxes, bags, shipping cans, cartons, cases, and containers. Tubes, bins, jars, bottles, and partitions are also offered. Capabilities include contract manufacturing, fabrication, 3D printing, thermoforming, and injection molding. Rapid prototyping services such as stereolithography (SLA), selective laser sintering (SLS), selective laser melting (SLM), laminated object manufacturing (LOM), and digital light processing (DLP) services are also available. Serves automotive, healthcare, pharmaceutical, cosmetic, beauty care, food, beverage, and retail industries. JIT delivery.
name: Stephen Gould

additional_activities: Distributor, Finishing Service Company, Manufacturer, Custom Manufacturer - Instant Quote, Service Company
description: Manufacturer of poly foam packaging. Made from polyester and polyether formulas. Features include compression resistance and sound dampening. Available in custom colors and rolls, sheets, strips, die cut, and cylinder form.
name: U.S. Rubber Supply Co.

description: Manufacturer and distributor of packaging materials including anti-static, medical, shopping, trash, produce, equipment, non-woven, mattress, trade show, vacuum seal, special and zip lock reclosable bags. Features vary depending upon model, including ESD and EMI shielding, reclosable single track zippers, bottom or side gusseted design, adhesive closures, knob holes, twist-ties, seamless and three wall construction, outer pouches and vapor, water, radiation and grease-proof. Custom options and stock items available.
name: Universal Plastic Bag Co.

description: Custom manufacturer of food and personal care packaging materials. Products include bags, trays, pouches, jars, blisters, pails, and buckets. Suitable for use in applications such as powder, granule, candy, liquid, and paste.
name: Mattpak, Inc.

description: Distributor and manufacturer of standard and custom packaging supplies including cellular and cushioning foam. Made from polyethylene, PVC, polyester, polyurethane, Volara®, neoprene and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA). Available in sheets and rolls. Foam planks, inserts and mattress pads are also provided. Features vary depending upon model, including peel and stick backing and heat, oil, water and solvent resistance. Capabilities include CNC cutting, slitting, splitting, bonding, heat welding and foam peeling. Heat laminating, spraying and hot melt wide roller coating services are also provided. Suitable for packaging, vibration dampening, bedding, sound control, storage and shipping applications. Serves the aircraft, automotive, packaging, marine, transportation, medical, defense and education industries. GSA approved. Made in the USA.
name: All Foam Products Co., Inc.

description: Manufacturer of standard and custom packaging supplies including anti-static nylon and polyethylene and thermoplastic film, roll bag dispensers, and heat sealers. Serves the automotive, aerospace, medical, pharmaceutical, university, and government industries. Made in the USA.
name: Liberty Industries, Inc.

description: Blister and clamshell packaging services for the consumer, medical, industrial control, automotive, marine, electronics, and emergency lighting industries. Meets QS standards. UL listed.
name: Pace Electronics

description: Distributor of packaging materials and supplies including stretch wraps, labels, sealing tapes, boxes, zip lock bags, envelopes, and films. Padded, corrugated, and reinforced mailers are also provided. Aerosol, boxes, tubes, canisters, label dispensers, and markers are offered. Gummed paper, sealing, reinforced, and non-reinforced tapes are available. Serves aerospace, automotive, appliance, construction, electrical, and medical industries.
name: Carolina Tape & Supply Corp.

additional_activities: Distributor, Manufacturer, Custom Manufacturer - Instant Quote, Service Company
description: Packaging services for dietary supplements and oral pouches. Capabilities include bottle, jar, or pouch filling, label application, case cartoning, overwrapping, shrink‑sleeving, and palletizing. Glass, PET, or HDPE bottles and multi‑layer barrier pouches are offered. Equipment includes form‑fill‑seal machines, rotary fillers, labelers, and cartoners. Secondary services include desiccant insertion, induction sealing, and fulfillment. Facilities maintain cGMP compliance, allergen segregation, and environmental monitoring. In‑house QA labs perform weight verification, seal integrity, moisture, and microbial testing. Full batch traceability and regulatory documentation ensure packaging meets supplement industry standards.
name: Daily Manufacturing Solutions Inc.

description: ISO 9001:2015 certified. manufacturer providing polybagging and various packaging services. Components handled range from fasteners, hardware, brackets, casters, bushings, clips and O-rings. Capable of placing both large and small items ranging from 1 to 1,000 of the same part and 1 to 25 of different parts. Bags are available in sizes ranging from 3 in. to 24 in. width and length and thicknesses from 1.9 to 8 mil. Imprinting capabilities allow for logos, labels and branding messages. Capabilities include blister packaging, skin packaging, labeling, bar coding, hand counting and sub-assemblies. Industries served include OEM, automotive and transportation. Products meet Mil-I-4528 standards and are QS 14000 compliant. Made in the USA.
name: Associated Fastening Products, Inc.

additional_activities: Custom Manufacturer, Distributor, Finishing Service Company, Custom Manufacturer - Instant Quote, Service Company
description: AS9100D and ISO 9001:2015 certified. Contract manufacturer of assembly kit packaging for consumer electronics. Serves pharmaceuticals, food or beverage, aerospace, agricultural, automotive, marine, medical, and transportation industries.
name: OneMonroe (Monroe Engineering Products)

description: Distributor of packaging prouducts including bags, corrugated boxes, labels, films, foam & tapes. Packaging bags such as mailing bags, paper bags, merchandise bags, plastic bags, static shielding bags & moisture barrier bags are available. Types of corrugated boxes include suspension/retention boxes, heavy-duty boxes, multi-depth boxes, bulk cargo boxes, printer's boxes, moving boxes, side loading boxes, computer packing boxes, file storage boxes, telescoping boxes & insulated shipping boxes. Corrugated boxes are available in cube, flat, tall & long shape configurations.
